#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int min1(int a,int b)
{
    if(a<b)
        return a;
    else
        return b;
}
int max1(int a,int b)
{
    if(a>b)
        return a;
    else
        return b;
}
int main()
{
    int t=0,x1=0,x2=0,area=0,y1=0,y2=0,y3=0,y4=0,x3=0,x4=0,ar1=0,ar2=0,right=0,left=0,top=0,bottom=0;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
        ar1=((x2-x1)*(y2-y1));
        cin >> x3 >> y3 >> x4 >> y4;
        ar2=((x4-x3)*(y4-y3));
        area=ar1+ar2;
        left=max1(x1,x3);
        right=min1(x2,x4);
        top=min1(y2,y4);
        bottom=max1(y1,y3);
        if(right-left>0&&top-bottom>0)
        {
            area-=(right-left)*(top-bottom);
        }
        cout << (area) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
